properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 15 NOV
   BY M/V SW DIAMOND TOWING TWO 225 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   21-19.21S 039-50.63W, 21-19.07S 040-01.48W,
   21-10.25S 040-06.97W, 21-08.54S 040-06.94W,
   21-06.63S 040-05.30W, 21-03.92S 040-01.40W,
   21-03.96S 039-54.64W, 21-06.20S 039-50.54W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 16 NOV 21.
